errors.name: AccessTokenInvalid
errors.explanation: Twilio was unable to validate your Access Token

errors.name: AccessTokenHeaderInvalid
errors.explanation: The header of the Access Token provided to the Twilio API was invalid

errors.name: AccessTokenIssuerInvalid
errors.explanation: The issuer or subject of the Access Token provided to the Twilio API was invalid

errors.name: AccessTokenExpired
errors.description: Access token expired or expiration date invalid
errors.explanation: The Access Token provided to the Twilio API has expired, the expiration time specified in the token was invalid, or the expiration time specified was too far in the future

errors.name: AccessTokenNotYetValid
errors.explanation: The Access Token provided to the Twilio API is not yet valid

errors.name: AccessTokenGrantsInvalid
errors.explanation: The Access Token signature and issuer were valid, but the grants specified in the token were invalid, unparseable, or did not authorize the action being requested

errors.name: AccessTokenSignatureInvalid
errors.explanation: The signature for the Access Token provided was invalid.

errors.name: AuthenticationFailed
errors.explanation: The Authentication with the provided JWT failed

errors.name: ExpirationTimeExceedsMaxTimeAllowed
errors.description: Expiration Time Exceeds Maximum Time Allowed
errors.explanation: The expiration time provided when creating the JWT exceeds the maximum duration allowed

errors.name: Forbidden
errors.explanation: The account lacks permission to access the Twilio API. Typically this means the account has been suspended or closed. For assistance, please contact support
